name: Acorn Fall (Maya Carter)
description:
Use arrow keys or WASD to dig your way down to the required depth to establish your tree.

Watch out for rocks  and don't run out of water 

If you see a differently colored water droplet   it means another player has died there. You can soak up the water they left behind, but be careful not to meet the same fate as them!

This game was built for the Global Game Jam 2023 with the theme ROOTS

CREDITS:

Maya Carter - Gameplay Programmer, Level Designer, Artist

Skips A Beat Music (skipsabeatmusic.com) twitch.tv/skipsabeatmusic - Music and SFX
